title: Microbial Ecology
description: Advanced studies of microbial ecosystems, the specific roles of bacteria in maintaining ecological balance, and the evolution of the ecosystem in response to changing environments.

prerequisites: BIOL 3380 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D and BIOL 3381 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D
